text: Eghtɨ ian namakataba, nguibar ekiar igharazibar ikegh izɨ uarir akurvagh kotiaba tuisɨghsɨ ian azangtɨ, ia men akuragh kotiaba tuisɨghamin arazir aghuibar men sure damu. Gumazim, gumazir igharazimɨn mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir kotiam ko, gumazim Godɨn Araziba, ko an Akar Gavgaviba abɨghizir kotiam, ko gumazim arazir God ifongeziba abɨghizimɨn kotiam ko arazir God damuasa ia mɨkemeziba abɨghizir kotiam, ia men sure damutɨ, me Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn osɨmtɨziba puvatɨgham. Eghtɨ ia ko ian adarasi, Godɨn damazimɨn osɨmtɨziba puvatɨghtɨ, God ian anɨngagheghan kogham.
